chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}

Goal:
forall (c : code) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_prefix c -> In (a, l) c -> find_val l c = Some a

Premises:
unique_prefix = fun l : code => (forall (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), In (a1, lb1) l -> In (a2, lb2) l -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2) /\ unique_key l : code -> Prop
code = list (A * list bool) : Type
find_val = fix find_val (a : list bool) (l : code) {struct l} : option A := match l with | [] => None | (b, c) :: l1 => if list_eq_dec Bool.bool_dec a c then Some b else find_val a l1 end : list bool -> code -> option A Arguments find_val _%list_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
find_val_correct1 : forall (c : code) (a : A) (l : list bool), find_val l c = Some a -> In (a, l) c
find_code_correct2 : forall (c : code) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code a c = l
find_code_correct1 : forall (c : code) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
unique_prefix_not_null : forall (c : code) (a b : A), a <> b -> in_alphabet [a; b] c -> unique_prefix c -> not_null c
unique_prefix_inv : forall (c : code) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_prefix ((a, l) :: c) -> unique_prefix c
unique_prefix1 : forall (c : code) (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), unique_prefix c -> In (a1, lb1) c -> In (a2, lb2) c -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2
in_alphabet = fun (m : list A) (c : code) => forall a : A, In a m -> exists l : list bool, In (a, l) c : list A -> code -> Prop Arguments in_alphabet _%list_scope
in_alphabet_cons : forall (m : list A) (c : list (A * list bool)) (a : A) (ca : list bool), In (a, ca) c -> in_alphabet m c -> in_alphabet (a :: m) c
add_frequency_list_1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), (forall ca : nat, ~ In (a, ca) l) -> In (a, 1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l)
add_frequency_list_not_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list (A * nat)) (a b : A) (n : nat), a <> b -> In (a, n) m -> In (a, n) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec b m)
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0
frequency_number_of_occurrences : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (m : list A), In a m -> In (a, number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) (frequency_list eqA_dec m)
add_frequency_list_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list (A * nat)) (a : A) (n : nat), unique_key m -> In (a, n) m -> In (a, S n) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a m)
frequency_list_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (n : nat) (m : list A), In (a, n) (frequency_list eqA_dec m) -> In a m
Tauto.eval_f : (?TX -> Prop) -> (?TA -> Prop) -> Tauto.GFormula -> Prop where ?TA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
add_frequency_list_in_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a1 a2 : A) (b1 : nat) (l : list (A * nat)), In (a1, b1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a2 l) -> a1 = a2 \/ In (a1, b1) l
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
not_null = fun c : code => forall a : A, ~ In (a, []) c : code -> Prop
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?B : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]

```coq
intros c a l Hup Hin.
apply find_val_correct1 in Hin.
destruct Hin as [Hin1 Hin2].
destruct Hup as [Hup1 Hup2].
apply unique_prefix1 with (c := c) (a1 := a) (lb1 := l) in Hup1; trivial.
Qed.
```
